description.native_language: Learn basic greetings such as 'hello' and 'goodbye'.
description.target_language: Aprende saludos básicos como 'hola' y 'adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'hola' in a greeting context
User produces the word 'adiós' in a farewell context

description.native_language: Learn how to count from 1 to 10.
description.target_language: Aprende a contar del 1 al 10.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the number 'uno' in a counting context
User produces the number 'diez' in a counting context

description.native_language: Learn basic colors like red and blue.
description.target_language: Aprende colores básicos como rojo y azul.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'rojo' as a color
User produces the word 'azul' as a color

description.native_language: Learn to confirm and deny using yes and no.
description.target_language: Aprende a confirmar y negar usando sí y no.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'sí' in an affirmative context
User produces the word 'no' in a negative context

description.native_language: Learn to introduce yourself and ask someone's name.
description.target_language: Aprende a presentarte y preguntar el nombre de alguien.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Me llamo' followed by a name
User asks '¿Cómo te llamas?' correctly

description.native_language: Learn the days of the week and months of the year.
description.target_language: Aprende los días de la semana y los meses del año.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'lunes' referring to Monday
User arranges 'enero, febrero, marzo' in sequence

description.native_language: Identify and name basic objects like 'book' and 'chair'.
description.target_language: Identifica y nombra objetos básicos como 'libro' y 'silla'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces the word 'libro' referring to a book
User produces the word 'silla' referring to a chair

description.native_language: Describe and name family members.
description.target_language: Describe y nombra miembros de la familia.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'madre' or 'padre' in a family context
User identifies 'hermano' and 'hermana' when describing siblings

description.native_language: Learn names of common foods and drinks.
description.target_language: Aprende nombres de alimentos y bebidas comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'manzana' for apple in an eating context
User correctly mentions 'agua' in a sentence about drinking

description.native_language: Identify and describe weather conditions.
description.target_language: Identifica y describe las condiciones del tiempo.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'hace sol' to describe a sunny day
User says 'está nublado' for a cloudy day

description.native_language: Learn words for giving and understanding directions.
description.target_language: Aprende palabras para dar y entender direcciones.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'izquierda' in a directional context
User correctly uses 'derecha' in a directional context

example_correct.target_language: Gira a la derecha en la esquina.

example_correct.native_language: The bank is on the left.
example_correct.target_language: El banco está a la izquierda.

description.native_language: Learn basic shopping vocabulary.
description.target_language: Aprende vocabulario básico de compras.

evaluation_criteria: User uses the word 'precio' when discussing cost
User mentions 'comprar' in a sentence about shopping

example_correct.native_language: What is the price of this bag?
example_correct.target_language: ¿Cuál es el precio de esta bolsa?

example_correct.native_language: I want to buy a shirt.

description.native_language: Discuss common daily activities.
description.target_language: Habla sobre actividades diarias comunes.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'despertarse' correctly to mean waking up
User uses 'trabajar' in the context of daily work

description.native_language: Talk about leisure activities and hobbies.
description.target_language: Habla sobre actividades de ocio y pasatiempos.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'leer' when discussing reading as a hobby
User correctly uses 'jugar' to talk about playing sports

example_correct.target_language: Él juega al fútbol después de la escuela.

description.native_language: Learn common travel expressions and words.
description.target_language: Aprende expresiones y palabras comunes relacionadas con los viajes.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'viajar' correctly to discuss traveling
User mentions 'avión' in a sentence about modes of transport

example_correct.native_language: I love to travel to new countries.
example_correct.target_language: Me encanta viajar a nuevos países.

description.native_language: Discuss health issues and wellness tips.
description.target_language: Habla sobre problemas de salud y consejos de bienestar.

evaluation_criteria: User correctly uses 'salud' in the context of health
User mentions 'medicamento' when discussing medicine

example_correct.native_language: Take this medicine twice a day.
example_correct.target_language: Toma este medicamento dos veces al día.

description.native_language: Covers basic greetings like 'Hola' and 'Adiós'.
description.target_language: Cubre saludos básicos como 'Hola' y 'Adiós'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces sentences starting with 'Hola' or 'Adiós'
Sentence is a greeting or farewell

description.native_language: Teaches affirmations like 'Sí' and negations like 'No'.
description.target_language: Enseña afirmaciones como 'Sí' y negaciones como 'No'.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'Sí' as a positive response
User produces 'No' as a negative response

description.native_language: Understanding and usage of basic numbers and colors.
description.target_language: Comprensión y uso de números y colores básicos.

evaluation_criteria: User produces words like 'uno,' 'dos', 'rojo', 'azul' in context
User uses numbers in a simple sentence

description.native_language: Usage of 'el', 'la', and 'un', 'una'.
description.target_language: Uso de 'el', 'la' y 'un', 'una'.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains 'el' or 'la' preceding a noun
Sentence contains 'un' or 'una' preceding a noun

description.native_language: Conjugating regular -ar, -er, -ir verbs in present tense.
description.target_language: Conjugación de verbos regulares -ar, -er, -ir en presente.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains a present tense verb form like 'hablo', 'como', 'vivo'

description.native_language: Form basic questions using voice intonation.
description.target_language: Formar preguntas básicas usando la entonación.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence starts with a verb and has a question mark
Correct word order for questions

description.native_language: Use of -ar verbs like 'hablar', 'estudiar' in present tense.
description.target_language: Uso de verbos -ar como 'hablar', 'estudiar' en presente.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains an -ar verb in the first person present tense like 'yo hablo'
Sentence contains an -ar verb in the third person present tense like 'él habla'

description.native_language: Using 'no' to make negative statements.
description.target_language: Uso de 'no' para hacer declaraciones negativas.

evaluation_criteria: User produces 'no' followed by a conjugated verb to form a negative statement

description.native_language: Use question words like '¿Quién?', '¿Qué?', and '¿Dónde?'.
description.target_language: Uso de palabras interrogativas como '¿Quién?', '¿Qué?' y '¿Dónde?'.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains a question word followed by a verb and subject
Correct placement of question mark with a question word

description.native_language: Using irregular verbs like 'ser', 'estar', and 'ir' in present tense.
description.target_language: Uso de verbos irregulares como 'ser', 'estar' y 'ir' en presente.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains an irregular verb conjugated in present tense like 'soy', 'estoy', 'voy'

description.native_language: Using basic conjunctions like 'y', 'pero', 'o'.
description.target_language: Uso de conjunciones básicas como 'y', 'pero', 'o'.

evaluation_criteria: User connects two clauses using a conjunction like 'y', 'pero'

example_correct.target_language: Me gustan las manzanas y las naranjas.

description.native_language: Using the past tense with regular verbs.
description.target_language: Uso del pretérito con verbos regulares.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains a regular verb in the past tense like 'hablé', 'comí', 'viví'

name.native_language: Simple Future Tense with 'Ir a + Infinitive'

description.native_language: Expressing plans using 'ir a + infinitive'.
description.target_language: Expresar planes usando 'ir a + infinitivo'.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains 'voy a', 'vas a' or similar followed by an infinitive verb

example_correct.native_language: I am going to travel tomorrow.

description.native_language: Using basic reflexive verbs like 'levantarse', 'bañarse'.
description.target_language: Uso de verbos reflexivos básicos como 'levantarse', 'bañarse'.

evaluation_criteria: Sentence contains a reflexive verb form in the present tense like 'me levanto', 'te bañas'

example_incorrect.native_language: Yo levanto me a las siete.
example_incorrect.target_language: Yo levanto me a las siete.

description.native_language: Learn how to greet people in informal and formal settings.
description.target_language: Aprende a saludar a la gente en contextos informales y formales.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Hola' followed by a name for informal greeting
User uses 'Buenos días'/'Buenas tardes'/'Buenas noches' for appropriate time of day
User uses '¿Cómo estás?' in informal context
User uses '¿Cómo está usted?' in formal context

description.native_language: Learn basic phrases for saying goodbye.
description.target_language: Aprende frases básicas para decir adiós.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Adiós' in a correct context
User uses 'Hasta luego' appropriately
User uses 'Nos vemos' correctly

description.native_language: Learn to thank someone in basic situations.
description.target_language: Aprende a agradecer a alguien en situaciones básicas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Gracias' in an appropriate context
User uses 'De nada' correctly in response

description.native_language: Learn to respond to questions with basic yes or no answers.
description.target_language: Aprende a responder preguntas con respuestas básicas de sí o no.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Sí' as a positive response
User uses 'No' as a negative response

description.native_language: Learn how to introduce yourself and others.
description.target_language: Aprende a presentarte a ti mismo y a otros.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Me llamo [Name]' to introduce themselves
User uses 'Te presento a [Name]' to introduce someone else

description.native_language: Learn the difference between formal and informal address.
description.target_language: Aprende la diferencia entre la dirección formal e informal.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'tú' correctly in informal conversation
User uses 'usted' correctly in formal conversation

description.native_language: Learn to ask basic questions.
description.target_language: Aprende a hacer preguntas básicas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses question words appropriately in questions
User uses intonation or question mark correctly

description.native_language: Learn to make polite requests using appropriate phrases.
description.target_language: Aprende a hacer solicitudes corteses usando frases apropiadas.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'por favor' in requests
User formulates request using '¿Podrías...?'

description.native_language: Learn how to express simple opinions.
description.target_language: Aprende a expresar opiniones simples.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Creo que...' to express an opinion
User uses 'Pienso que...' appropriately

description.native_language: Learn how to apologize politely.
description.target_language: Aprende a disculparte de manera cortés.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Lo siento' in a context of apology
User uses 'Perdón' when apologizing

description.native_language: Learn how to express basic needs to others.
description.target_language: Aprende a expresar necesidades básicas a otros.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Necesito...' to express a need
User uses 'Quiero...' when expressing wishes or needs

description.native_language: Learn to give simple instructions to others.
description.target_language: Aprende a dar instrucciones simples a otros.

evaluation_criteria: User uses imperative form correctly
Instruction starts with verb

description.native_language: Learn to express preferences in various contexts.
description.target_language: Aprende a expresar preferencias en varios contextos.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Prefiero...' to express a preference
User uses 'Me gusta más...' when stating preference

example_incorrect.native_language: Me gusta mucho el de chocolate.
example_incorrect.target_language: Me gusta mucho el de chocolate.

description.native_language: Learn to describe simple future plans or intentions.
description.target_language: Aprende a describir planes o intenciones futuras simples.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Voy a...' correctly for future plans
User mentions time or place related to the plan

description.native_language: Learn to provide reasonable excuses using simple language.
description.target_language: Aprende a dar excusas razonables con lenguaje simple.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'No puedo...' appropriately for excuses
User uses 'Es que...' to explain why they can't do something

example_correct.native_language: No puedo ir porque estoy enfermo.
example_correct.target_language: No puedo ir porque estoy enfermo.

description.native_language: Learn to make suggestions using simple phrases.
description.target_language: Aprende a hacer sugerencias usando frases simples.

evaluation_criteria: User uses 'Deberías...' to suggest actions
User uses 'Podrías...' to offer suggestions

description.native_language: Learn the basics of negotiating in simple contexts, like buying something.
description.target_language: Aprende lo básico de la negociación en contextos simples, como comprar algo.

evaluation_criteria: User uses '¿Puede ser menos?' in negotiations
User uses 'Me gustaría...' to start negotiations

example_correct.native_language: ¿Puede ser menos? No tengo más dinero.
example_correct.target_language: ¿Puede ser menos? No tengo más dinero.

example_correct.native_language: Me gustaría pagar menos por esto.
example_correct.target_language: Me gustaría pagar menos por esto.
